text: Agar Allah tujhey kisi museebat mein daley to khud uske siwa koi nahin jo is museebat ko taal de, aur agar woh tere haqq mein kisi bhalayi ka irada karey to uske fazal ko pherne wala bhi koi nahin hai. Woh apne bandon mein se jisko chahta hai apne fazal se nawazta hai aur woh darguzar karne wala aur reham farmane wala hai
